title: Grateful Dead Live at The Spectrum on 1981-05-04
source: 2 source matrix by Dusborne; Soundboard (shnid:2250), Master Soundboard Cassette > Cassette > DAT > CDR, CD Mastering by Scott Clugston; Audience (shnid:134792),Sennheiser MD421 Dynamic Cardioid Microphones-TC D5 Cassette Recorder,Location:Soundboard,Analog to Digital: Dolby B Decoded Cassette Master played back on Nakamichi Dragon-Korg MR-1000(DSF[1-bit 5.6448 MHz Stereo]) Recording,Editing and Mastering by Jim Wise, Transfer by David Minches
